translations: n.爬行者；[电子] 扰频器；周率扰乱器

sentences.sentence: Scramblers can often unnerve a better tennis player.
sentences.translation: 抢球者经常会使一个更优秀的网球运动员紧张。

sentences.sentence: EIS is to schedule and manage the front devices in DTV field, it can manage products, schedule scramblers, arrange CAS simulcrypt and so on.
sentences.translation: EIS是数字电视前端的管理调度系统，完成产品管理、加扰器的调度、CAS的同密管理等功能。

sentences.sentence: This paper presents a method of expanding matrix, which makes the traditional matrix method capable of realizing parallel scramblers of any size.
sentences.translation: 而且提出了一种扩展矩阵的方法，使传统的矩阵法可以用来实现任意路数的并行扎码器。
